location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Partial letter no.56 of 1825 (Political Department) to William Newnham, Chief Secretary, Government of Bombay, from Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter's contents are not known because the letter has been truncated, a result of the weeding and refiling that took place in 1955, to reduce three volumes to the present volume.
